issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Get the project from barcelona: 10.0.1.40/Appcelerator/Thomas/forNatalie/KitchenSinkThomas
2. Add a breakpoint on line 21 in the app.js file
3. Run project in debug

Actual Result:
Debugger progress waits for debugger to connect and stuck at 57% and application just launches

Expected Result:
To stop at the breakpoint

Note:
Same project works fine with Android
fields.summary: iOS: Debugger fails to connect when running certain projects, the debugger.plist is not being created
fields.environment: Environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105201912 May 23 2011 07:43 r86dae2c9 with iOS 4.3 Emulator

comments.body: Tested with May 30 2011 13:11 r566ab19b with Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105271818
Also confirmed by Max resolved in Titanium iOS SDK 1.7.0 with hash 15c8ade
